data.text: Implement interrupt/exception handling — Add interrupt vector table, status register (interrupt enable/disable, interrupt pending flags), and pipeline flush-on-interrupt logic. Needs: IVT in memory, ISR entry/return instructions (RETI), ability to save/restore PC and status on interrupt, masking. Reuse existing branch flush mechanism as starting point for pipeline interrupt injection. Consider: edge vs level triggered, priority levels, nested interrupt support.
